```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("loanapplicant.csv")
```

```{r}
head(df)
```

```{r}
pca_loan <- prcomp(df, scale. = TRUE, center = TRUE)
```

```{r}
summary(pca_loan)
```

```{r}
pca_loan$rotation
```

```{r}
pca_loan$x
```

```{r}
library(ggbiplot)

ggbiplot(pca_loan)

```
